title: How to Determine if Bread Dough Has Been Mixed Long Enough

steps.headline: After about 5 minutes of kneading, especially when dough feels stretchy, pinch off a small piece and stretch it slowly apart
Pulling and rotating it gently to stretch this piece of dough into a thin, translucent membrane
If it tears easily, continue kneading a few more minutes and try the test again

text: After about 5 minutes of kneading, especially when dough feels stretchy, pinch off a small piece and stretch it slowly apart  Pulling and rotating it gently to stretch this piece of dough into a thin, translucent membrane  If it tears easily, continue kneading a few more minutes and try the test again
